Global Namespace Inheritance Tree Inheritance Graph Name Index
template <typename T, typename Block>
class vsip::Matrix
File: ../../../vsip/matrix.hpp

View which appears as a two-dimensional, modifiable matrix. This inherits from const_Matrix, so only the members that const_Matrix does not carry, or that are different, need be specified.
